title: Issues Updating Too 5.19[Repost]
body: Hello everyone, I'd like too discuss an annoying problem I've come across. This morning I've let my computer update League for about an hour and it only went up too 32%. So I waited and waited for about 2-3 more hours and it STILL was on 32%. Is anyone else facing these problems? Is this a problem with my computer or am I just not being patient enough? Considering how small the update is, it shouldn't take more than thirty minutes. Also my disk storage goes all the way too 100% and my computer becomes VERY slow when I try too update. Also on a side note, I have NEVER had a problem with updating League for as long as I could remember. I'd like someone too help me solve this very irritating issue.

replies.body: It probably is, but im looking for other people that might have had this problem or resolved it already.
